means: （使）适应， （使）适合( adapt的过去式和过去分词 )
适应于，适应不同情况（或环境）(to)

sentence.Network_en: The camel's feet, well adapted for dry sand, are useless on mud.
sentence.Network_cn: 骆驼的蹄子虽然非常适合于在干沙上行走，碰到泥泞时却无计可施。

sentence.Network_en: Her son Peter adapted effortlessly to his new surroundings.
sentence.Network_cn: 她儿子彼得很快就适应了新环境。

sentence.Network_en: The facilities have been adapted to give access to wheelchair users.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些设施已经改造过以方便轮椅使用者进入。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... adaptable 能适应的 adapted 适合的 adapter 适配器.

list.abs: 高一英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... habitat n 生活环境；栖息地 △ adapt vt 使适应；改编 adapt to 适应（新环境等）.
雅思词汇表_百度文库 ... acrylic 丙烯酸的 adapt 使适应 addict 使沉溺.
...视机(Tv)实现了二相插座的接口，现在我们定义一个适配器(Adapter)，这个适配器实现了三相插座的接口，所以它可以插在三相插座 …
英文面试常见问题 ... initiative 主动 adaptability 适应性 budget 预算.
一、适应(adaptation):当内外环境变动的时候，系统需要具备妥当的准备和相当的弹性，以适应新的变化来减轻紧张、磨擦的不良后果。

entry.def: If something is adapted to a particular situation or purpose, it is especially suitable for it.

example.ex: The camel's feet, well adapted for dry sand, are useless on mud.
example.tran: 骆驼的蹄子虽然非常适合于在干沙上行走，碰到泥泞时却无计可施。

means.word_mean: 1. changed in order to improve or made more fit for a particular purpose;

sentences.sentence: "instructions altered to suit the children's different ages"

auth_sentence.content: Sitting is not what we are adapted to do.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sitting is not what we are adapted to do.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sitting is not what we are adapted to do.

auth_sentence.content: The protocol can be adapted in a pragmatic manner.
auth_sentence.res_content: The protocol can be adapted in a pragmatic manner.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The protocol can be adapted in a pragmatic manner.

auth_sentence.content: The old highways...adapted themselves...to the physiognomy of the country.
auth_sentence.res_content: The old highways...adapted themselves...to the physiognomy of the country.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The old highways...adapted themselves...to the physiognomy of the country.

Sentence.sentence: Curriculums have been adapted to students' needs.
Modern urban life in rich countries is not well adapted to large families.
He has had his truck adapted for cold temperatures.
